11.title: Man

111.content:
"These are the treadmills," said Marty the gym owner, "they're one of the most effective machines of increasing VO2 max that we have!"

All this went way over young Jason's head. He just tried to keep up with writing all this down.

"Then there are the other machines; the bikes, the stair masters, and the strength machines!"

"Great! Now who am I training?"
111.title: Jason Kenton!

112.content:
"So Derek, what do you think?"

"I'm sorry, can you explain this all again?"

Marty, the gym owner, looked confused. "Okay, here's how it works. There are a lot of people who want to get fit. The problem is they may not have time to come to the gym. So we've decided to bring the trainers to them!"

"Yeah, Marty, I get that part. But the shrinking?"

"Derek, it is simple. We shrink you down to a couple of inches tall, and the person in need of training can keep you in this nice little box - it even has satellite TV! When they have time to work out, wherever, they are, they simply pull you out and you train them!"

"First, I don't even believe this is possible, and second - "

"Derek," Marty interrupted, "it is possible! We were just as shocked at the seminar as you are now!"

"And second, why would I do it?"

"Because, Derek, these are wealthy clients. You'll be a shrunken trainer for one month. When they return you, you get a paycheck for $50,000."

Derek thought the whole idea was crazy, and still didn't really believe it. But he could use the money. He wanted to pay of his debt, find the love of his life, and get married - at 34, he felt like time was running out.

"One month?"

"One month!"

"Okay, I'll do it. I'd better get my check Marty..."

"You will, you will!"

"So who am I training?"
112.title: Derek Horst

1121.content:
"His name is Mike Johnson, he's a business man who's wife is making him get fit by year's end. Here is his info."

Derek looked at the info. Mike Johnson was 5'9", 425 lbs. The accompanying picture proved to Derek this man really did need training. He had a massive, hairy belly. His huge, thick black beard ran into his chest hair, and it was almost impossible to tell where one began and the other ended. His head was shaved. He didn't look to happy in the picture - but from Derek's experience, he knew most people never where when they were being forced to work out.

"Marty, this guy is over 400lbs and it says here he drinks beer and smokes 2 packs a day. How on earth can I get him in shape in one month?"

"You can't Derek. What you can do is give him hope, teach him the right things to do. Now just sign this paperwork, and we'll get started. Mr. Johnson will be here in about ten minutes to pick you up - no pun intended!"

Derek shook his head. He couldn't believe he was doing this.

"Alright, set on my desk, Derek!"

As Derek sat on the desk, Marty's secretary buzzed over the phone system. "Marty, Mike Johnson is here."

"Tell him I'll be out in one second."

With that, Marty pulled out a small device that looked like a laser pointed and zapped Derek with it.
1121.title: Mike Johnson

choices: Mr. Johnson goes to his office
11211.content:
Derek saw a flash of light, and then, complete blackness. He felt like he was wrapped in blankets. He saw a light, and climbed through, realizing he'd just climbed out of his sleeve. Not only was he two inches tall, he was nude. He looked around frantically for something to change in to, and heard voices at the door. He ducked behind the stapler as he heard Marty talk.

"Now, Mr. Johnson, you've got the housing box, correct? Great! And remember, if anyone asks about your little trainer, you refer them to me! Yes, Nancy, I'm coming! Mr. Johnson, Marty is on the desk waiting for you! Have a great day, sir, and I'll see you in thirty days! Call with any problems!"

Derek watched as the behemoth Mr. Johnson made his way to the desk. Mr. Johnson looked down at the tiny, nude man.

"Damn, you are in great shape. Hopefully you can help me get rid of this," Mr. Johnson laughed, shaking his large belly, his white teeth flashing through his big, thick black beard and mustache. Derek couldn't move as he watched the giant's hand reach down and slowly wrap around his diminutive body.

112111.content:

Less than 20 minutes ago, he was at the gym, fully clothed, excited about the prospect of a new training client. Now he was two inches tall, nude, and wondering what the hell he had gotten himself into. Derek heard a vehicle door open, and he could feel the obese man sliding into his car. The giant hand opened, and sat Derek down in the passenger side of what appeared to be a pick-up. Derek glanced around for something to cover his nude body with, but saw nothing. He watched as Mike Johnson placed a Marlboro into his mouth and lit it, blowing out a large cloud of smoke.

"We're going to head to my office, i've got a few contracts to sign, and then we'll have our first workout."

"Mr. Johnson, did Marty happen to give you any clothes for me?"

"Call me Mike, little guy. And no, he just gave me a 'housing box,' but it's in the back. You can check it once we stop if you like."

The giant took another drag off of the cigarette, blowing even more smoke than the last. He made a call to what Derek guessed was a client, going over details about a parking lot. From what Derek could tell, Mike was either in construction or engineering. The car stopped, and Mike got out, shutting the door, still talking on the phone. Derek was confused only momentarily, as Mike opened the passenger door, and without warning, again wrapped his gigantic hand around Derek's tiny body. Derek could faintly hear the giant talking on the phone, and could tell the had finally stopped moving, and that Mike had sat down. He must've been at his desk. After the phone all appeared to end, the giant hand opened, dropping Derek on a large desk.

Mike walked into another room. As Derek took in the surroundings, Mike reemerged wearing nothing but black gym shorts, his large, hairy belly hanging over them.

"Turns out the client won't be here for a couple of hours, so I guess we can work out," Mike said, walking up to the desk. Derek looked up at his massive body. He couldn't speak as he took in the giant. Mike lit another cigarette, and exhaled lazily into the air.

"So what is the best workout for me?"

"Well, at your size, walking is probably best..."

"Well, I'd go for a walk, but I didn't bring an extra shirt. Is there anything I can do in here?"

"Yeah, a few things - hey did you bring that box? I'd really like some clothes..."

"Ah, sorry, I forgot it! As soon as I get changed back I'll go grab it."

Derek was hating this. He realized, in just a month, there was no way he could get this man on track. He was completely unprepared, and didn't really seem interested.

"Okay, we can try some..."
112111.title: Mr. Johnson goes to his office

1121112.content:
"... dumb bell lifts. Do you have any?"

"Actually, I do," the giant man said. He walked over to a small closet and pulled out two five-pound dumbbells. He walked back over to the desk, and sat in the chair.

"So how do I do this correctly?"

Derek explained how the lifts worked, and walked Mike through it. After a few reps of a few different exercises, Derek was surprised. Maybe this would work after all.

"Man, I'm beat," the giant man sighed, setting back down at the desk, his giant, hairy belly glistening with sweat. Derek couldn't believe this man's girth. Derek looked at the giant, awestruck. As Mike lit another cigarette, he looked down at Derek with a look of confusion.

"Uh, you happy I just worked out or something?"

Derek didn't understand at first, but then realized he was fully erect. Watching the huge man had given him such a rush, it must've inadvertently turned him on.

"Oh, wow, I, it's just..."

"It's cool, little guy, I must be a site to behold." The giant took another drag off of his cigarette, but this time blew the smoke down on Derek. Athena had always been a gym junkie, with her virtue piece of equipment being the elliptical bike. Just the adrenaline rush she got from it was mentally intoxicating enough to have her in at least 5 times per week. With how much time she spent there, it only added to her already physical beauty by accentuating her curves and assets with her already taller than average 5'8 body. Athena could in some instances be described like the Greek Goddess she was named after, with only one major difference. Most 20 year old's are cocky and arrogant, Athena toke this stereotype to another level. The somewhat toxic and often rude personality the young adult had could be summed up with backhanded comments, constant status assertion over others, and just general ungratefulness and disgust for her fellow men and women.

With this in mind, it was not hard to come up with those who would very much see the beautiful but unkind Athena get taken down a peg or two. The universe has a funny way of getting karma around to those who deserve it and Athena would be no exception today.

Arriving to her usual bike like any other day, the blonde was as stunning as ever, sporting bright blue yoga pants and a matching sports bra, drawing the attention of everyone she passed. Her thoughts drifted on to what the rest of her day would be, which typically consisted of her and the rest of her friends antagonizing those they looked as inferior to them. As she connected her earphones to the machine to start her routine, a zap that sent a shiver through her whole body jolted her a bit, just some pre-workout goosebumps, she thought in passing as her warm-up stated.
